title: A Trend With Weed Is A Friend Indeed 10/1: USPS, SuperBowl, Michael K. Williams, Majority of Trump, Joe Rogan, Brett Kavanaugh, NBA Dunksters
itunes:title: A Trend With Weed Is A Friend Indeed 10/1: USPS, SuperBowl, Michael K. Williams, Majority of Trump, Joe Rogan, Brett Kavanaugh, NBA Dunksters
description:
In this edition of A Trend With Weed Is A Friend Indeed, Jack and Miles discuss Louis DeJoy continuing to ruin the USPS, the SuperBowl halftime show line-up, Michael K. Williams' toxicology report, Trumpers being in favor of secession, Joe Rogan being even more dumberer, Brett Kavanaugh getting COVID, and who the best in-game dunkist?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
